If you're interested in a unique blend of humor and teenage rebellion, "Fast Times at Ridgemont High" might be right up your alley. This classic film explores the world of sex, drugs, and rock 'n' roll from the perspective of a group of high school students.

On the other hand, if you prefer something a bit more fantastical, "The Stuff" is a fun horror-comedy about a mysterious goo that turns people into mindless snackers. With stars like Danny Aiello and Paul Sorvino, it's definitely worth checking out!
